ARABIC: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُصْلِحُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they are told, 'Do not cause corruption on the earth,' they say, 'We are only putting things right.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When asked to desist from spreading corruption in the land they say: "Why, we are reformers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Whenever it is said to them, "Spread not disorder on the earth", their reply is, "We only seek to put things aright".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When they are told not to commit corruption in the land, they reply, "We are only reformers".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when it is said to them, “Do not cause turmoil in the earth”, they say, “We are only peacemakers!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when it is said to them: "Do not make mischief on the earth," they say: "We are only peacemakers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when it is said to them, Do not make mischief in the land, they say: We are but peace-makers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When it is said to them, 'Do not corruption in the land', they say, 'We are only ones that put things right.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when it is said unto them: Make not mischief in the earth, they say: We are peacemakers only.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When they are told, "Do not cause corruption in the land," they say, "We are only promoters of peace,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when it said unto them: act not corruptly on the earth, they say: we are but reconcilers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When they are told, ‘Do not cause corruption on the earth,’ they say, ‘We are only reformers!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When it is said to them: "Make not mischief on the earth," they say: "Why, we only Want to make peace!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when it is said to them: "Make not mischief on the earth," they say: "We are only peacemakers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When it is said to them, 'Do not corrupt in the land,' they reply, 'We are only reformers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when it is said to them, “Do not make trouble on earth,” they say, “We are only reformers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when it is said to them, "Do not cause corruption on the earth," they say, "We are but reformers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:11] When it is said to them, that is, these latter, ‘Do not spread corruption in the land’, through unbelief and hindering [people from] faith, They say, ‘We are only putting things right’, that is, ‘we are not engaging in corruption’. God, exalted be He, refutes them, saying:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when it is said unto them), i.e. the Jews (Make not mischief in the land) by preventing people from the Religion of Muhammad (pbuh) (they say: we are reformers only), we are reforming it through obedience.
